item.description:
Spectacle Pond (aka Spec Pond) is a great place for open water swimming. It is fairly shallow and newbie friendly. Many triathletes from central MA train here.

Boats are allowed here... so the safest route is to swim along the shore on the west side of the pond.

During the summer the beach is open to residents only after 11am.

Map of Spec Pond.

Directions:

From the east: Take Route 2 West to exit 36 towards Shirley Rd., merge right onto Fort Pond Rd., turn right onto Shirley Rd., turn right onto Old Union Turnpike, beach entrance will be about 1 mile on your left.

From the west: Take Route 2 East to exit 35 toward Old Union Turnpike Rd., turn left onto Old Union Turnpike, beach entrance will be on your right in about 0.4 miles.
item.how_to_find_us: The town beach entrance for Spectacle Pond is on Old Union Turnpike between Fire Road 3A and Fire Road 4.
